content:encoded:
Our hour of mystery begins with Nick Carter, Master Detective this week. We hear The Case Of The Luminous Spots, his story from April 27, 1947.

(27:22) We wrap up this week’s Case Closed with Death In A Fancy Dress, the December 27, 1948, episode of Let George Do It.

Download CaseClosed806

Your support keeps Case Closed coming every week. If you’d like to help, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you.
